Social And Cultural Activities: Established three colleges in Palamu and Gadhwa Districts: (i) Jodh Singh Namdhari Mahila Mahavidyalaya(Recognised), Daltonganj (ii)Sadguru Jagjeet Singh Namdhari College, Gadhawa (iii) Balwant Singh Namdhari Memorial College, Satbarwa
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Keen interest in literary writings and poetry and Articles about spiritualism were published in two books.
Other Information: (i) Niveden Samiti, 1997-2000; and (ii) Bihar State Road Transport Corporation, 1979-80
